products.name: Stinky Slinky Sewer Hose
products.description: Oh what fun times you'll have with this! Be sure to stock up on gloves and disinfectant soap before checkout!

products.name: Six-Point Auto-Leveling Jacks
products.description: Six-point electric auto-leveling jacks for your travel trailer or fifth wheel. No more yelling at your spouse for getting the number of wood blocks wrong! Just push a button and walk away!

products.name: Heated Fresh Water Hose
products.description: Heated hose for those freezing nights

products.name: 25' 50 amp Extension Cord
products.description: Quit parking your RV based on where the post is!

products.name: 5th Wheel Tripod Stabilizer
products.description: This rig won't be a rockin' when you have this tripod stabilizer on your 5th wheel hitch.

products.name: B&W Companion 25K Fifth Wheel Hitch
products.description: Specially designed to attach to the receivers in your factory 5th-wheel towing prep package, the Companion OEM features a dual jaw for excellent jaw-to-king-pin contact and a cam-action handle for simple release. Easily remove for full bed access.
